review: Works great and was effortless to install. I was watching Netflix within minutes of plugging it in first time!  Now it is always ready,even if I plug it I to a different TV!! Love it!!
author: jeanne a smith

review: The Fire TV Stick is easy to install and easy to use.  It's helpful to be an Amazon Prime member since this allows you to access tons of movies and TV shows.  The picture quality is great.  The Fire Stick is a good value.
author: M

review: Easy, inexpensive, great product and service.
author: Jason W Branch

review: Works like it says it does. Its a good price for a good product.
author: Heather Semore

review: Very simple yet elegant to use.
author: Jody Kulchinsky

review: Got this for my father for Father's Day! He loves it. Plus it was very easy to set-up!
author: KT

review: Only downside I never want to leave my couch
author: Beth

review: The fire stick is perfect! It has everything I need.
author: gina marie vodola
